playing a little Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo
So, remember Second Life? Yeah I blew that off too.
Thinking about buying a taser.
My new default response to "Thank You" has shifted from "You're welcome" and "No problem" to "Of course". Does that mean I'm a dick?
Illustrator is FREAKING OUT AHHHH.
I feel really accomplished in that I can thoroughly entertain a girl and do my job and daydream at the same time.
Oh boy. 40 more datapoints to display and then I'm left to designy styling things.
I think the best part about making infographics is I get to learn really cool info about things I wouldn't normally think about.
Cuddling with the heater in my boxers & working on this infographic.
I don't really understand coasters. I don't give a shit about drink condensation.
Took a quick walk outside and it is quite cold. Bitter winds. Cold feet. I need to find some sweatpants, dude.
Going to sleep early. Good gracious!
16 days and 9 pages into my journal of daily activities. Still trying to figure out how detailed I wanna be. I wanna remember good stories.
Got the basics of the infographic done. Wrap up tomorrow. I love making progress on things.
I enjoy simply mixing all the juices available to me (pineapple, grapefruit, orange, banana, coconut (milk, I suppose), lemon) for a drink.
I want a safe.
